description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. The fantasy world of Adoria is under siege. Follow the story of three unique characters using all of their skills, strength and magic in a turn-based game with RPG influences.
description.short: The fantasy world of Adoria is under siege. Follow the story of three unique characters using all of their skills, strength and magic in a turn-based game with RPG influences.
